Articles.Content: I saw the Damage System thing in the voting you put here. What exactly will the Damage System have?

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, Murican\_Jeb said:
> 
> 
> What exactly will the Damage System have?
> 

The damage system will basically be glass shatter. So when you hit the glass too hard, the glass will break, and you'll be left with a frame and glass shards. It's complex, but with enough scripting, it's doable.

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, 2001kraft said:
> 
> 
> The damage system will basically be glass shatter. So when you hit the glass too hard, the glass will break, and you'll be left with a frame and glass shards. It's complex, but with enough scripting, it's doable.
> 

Would it work with BD Armory?

> 
> 
> On 9/11/2016 at 6:02 PM, Murican\_Jeb said:
> 
> 
> Would it work with BD Armory?
> 

Most likely, yes.

Hey guys!

Give me a day or two and I'll get this mod ready for 1.2.

I noticed a very unpleasant bug with the tri panel related to textures; I'll go ahead and fix it and release the mod.
Update this weekend! Sunday, to be specific.
Well, okay, maybe a bit later.

Hi,

not seen this before, would fit perfectly with my planned playthrough.

will keep eye out for 1.2 version, good luck mate.

This weekend, I promise. The deadline is on Sunday, 5 PM PDT.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-10-28T23:58:46Z" title="10/28/2016 11:58  PM" data-short="7 yr">October 28, 2016</time> by 2001kraft**
VERSION 1.8 IS RELEASED! - **compatible with KSP 1.2** - **1x1 panel fix**

> 
> 
> On 12/31/2016 at 10:59 AM, 2001kraft said:
> 
> 
> Update for 1.2.1 will be coming shortly.
> 

did you mean 1.2.2?

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, Drew Kerman said:
> 
> 
> did you mean 1.2.2?
> 

Both.

Due to popular demand, the next update will contain multiple dome sizes; specifically, the small and medium domes. I am currently working out the logistics and sizes. There might be a redesign of this dome, since I do not like this model that much, as it seems to largely be useless for what I intended it to be.

I have made up my mind; there will be a redesign of the dome.

I am currently figuring out the new shape; most likely it will be a geodesic dome again. I am considering multiple options, though.

Multiple sizes will be included right away along with the redesign in the next update.

If you have any suggestions, let me know ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
VERSION 1.9 IS RELEASED! **• fully compatible with KSP 1.2.2** **• new dome model** **• 4 total dome sizes (10m, 3.75m, 2.5m, 1.25m)**
slowly building up my v1.2.2 install, will let you know if I come across any problems when I get to this

Does this mod work for 1.3?
As far as I am aware, yes. An official update will be coming out soon.

Would it be possible for you to make the glass panes have different versions that are toggled from the right click menu, those versions would consist of glass panes without frames on one side, two sides, three sides and frameless panes.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-06-02T19:15:16Z" title="06/02/2017 07:15  PM" data-short="7 yr">June 2, 2017</time> by WereCat**

> 
> 
> On 6/2/2017 at 0:10 PM, WereCat said:
> 
> 
> Would it be possible for you to make the glass panes have different versions that are toggled from the right click menu, those versions would consist of glass panes without frames on one side, two sides, three sides and frameless panes.
> 

I am certain that that is possible and that genuinely sounds great. It will take me a while to get this to be complete but I'll see what I can do. I also am a noob at scripting but I'll figure it out in due time.

Suggestion noted and stashed ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

Suggestion:   

Rectangular 1x2 panels for times when you do not want to have a frame in the middle when connecting two 1x1 together. This would be perfect for truck windshields ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
